text: The pizza crust is so flavourful and crispy (without being hard). They have quite a few specials, making it such a cheap eat!
Great pizza, sooo crunchy. The also have good deals on pizza wings and fries. The owners are pretty cool too

My new favourite! (OK, tied for favourite BUT) This is old school Toronto pizza with a crunchy crust and sweet sauce. You will definitely not see a snooty Napoli pizzaiolo bless the oven with his approval, but this is the kind of pizza I grew up with in the '80s (it's a bit like Pizza Delight or McDonald's pizza). Grab a slice a slice, pop an old Wrestlemania tape in the VCR and enjoy!
